Changelog
=========

----------------

* Reregistered base adatapter for OFS.interface.ITraversable [mylan]
* Rewrite indexer registration with help of plone.indexer [mylan]
* Removed metadata registration in portal catalog [mylan]
* Added tests [mylan]
* Added README [mylan]

* Initial release
